title: A Multipurpose Shop For Sale
details:
20 perches land (14 and 6 perches)
one is two storied building and ground floor use for business and first floor is the house.. not finished.
other building adjoin the same building but separate.
faced to Tawalama-Akuress main road
electricity,water and carpet roads
rapidly developing town
a government bank is near by property
If anyone like to buy with all items for sell is consider
close to Neluwa new town (7km)
An ideal for a show room, nursing home, office etc.
